file_content.text: Looks like the hack worked perfectly. I can get one command in before the system locks up. Just say the word, and I'll--
No. No, this can't be--the Hawkeyes are being executed. Admiral Riserre's orders.
Stay calm. Where would the admiral do this?
You have to focus.
What threat are the Hawkeyes to him?
Why execute them?
They're being executed for aiding the Republic. But they didn't do anything! I did--
I saw no trace of them here.
They must be off-site.
Don't worry. A death mark's not a binding contract.
No reason to panic.
I can use the satellite system to locate their position. These orders are less than an hour old. If you hurry--
You know his orders?
I can read. Easiest thing to pick up are comm messages.
If they're all like you, he did the galaxy a favor.
I can understand why.
If that's a joke, I'm not laughing. We have to do something!
Sarkus? Assault's already begun. There's an Imperial command compound... can't locate... destroying our defenses....
Use the satellite system to find command... shut down dispatch console... Madine out.
I'm really torn up about a bunch of stuff being destroyed, but we're talking life or death here.
We've only got one command. We have to use it to find the Hawkeyes!
Do it. I won't let innocent people die.
Find your friends.
The Hawkeyes are being held in the Okara Droid Factory. We're lucky--that's not too far away.
I brought down their biggest defenses with the turbolasers, but there's still a lot of Imperials inside.
If the Hawkeyes are still alive, I'll save them.
Nothing will stop me.
If the Empire has a strength, it's not in numbers.
Almost makes it easier.
They'll clear out pretty fast when I show up.
I'll crash their party.
Just how I like it.
Just don't have so much fun that you forget to save the Hawkeyes.
If this isn't worth it....
I'm with the Republic for life if you can get the Hawkeyes out of this.
I can't thank you enough. Now hurry!
The commander gave us orders. We're going to follow them.
Attack the Empire.
You and the commander can go to hell. I'm only helping to make sure Balmorra gets something out of this.
The command compound's located in the Markaran Wastes. No wonder your Republic scanners couldn't find it.
I used the turbolasers to level a lot of their buildings. The Imperials won't be happy. Enjoy.
I had to do what was best for Balmorra.
I had no choice, Iain.
Well, this Balmorran thinks you failed. Big time.
The Empire seeks to divide us through tragedy.
Don't give in to hate.
No, this is what you deserve. You're just too heartless to understand why.
Countless Republic soldiers will die to free Balmorra.
Try to see the big picture.
Looks like a lot of Balmorrans will die, too.
I didn't kill the Hawkeyes--the Empire did.
It wasn't even my fault!
And you let them, didn't you?
I don't like this either.
This guilt trip is pathetic.
This guilt trip is pathetic.
Someday you'll lose something you care about. I wish I could be the one to take it from you.
Save it. Hope you and the commander enjoy your victory party.
One satellite defense system, courtesy of me. How's that for the rookie, Hawkeyes? Guys?
Tell me the other Hawkeyes are just ignoring me.
It's just me and a bunch of dead Imperials.
Nothing here but bodies.
Odd... the Hawkeyes don't leave their posts--unless it's to help nice people like you.
Stay focused. We'll find the Hawkeyes later.
Priorities, Sarkus.
I would if I wasn't ignoring you myself.
You mean like I am?
I could turn this hack off, you know. If I wasn't inside Republic headquarters.
